It has been reported/observed that in certain cases the Bank Guarantee towards Performance Security have been submitted on behalf of a firm other than the successful Bidder and such Bank Guaranties are accepted by Technical Divisions. It may be seen that such Bank Guarantee furnished on behalf of a firm other than the successful Bidder has no legal value_ 2 In view of the above, it is requested to strictly adhere to and implement the provisions of RFP Concession Agreement /Contract Agreement and accept the Bank Guarantee strictly on behalf of successful/selected Bidder only. 3.
